title: An awnswear vnto the righte honorable the Lordes, of the Quene of Englandes most honorable privy councell concerning and Ebrew epistle of a rarely lerned Iew, most reverent towardes the Ebrew skill of English, [and] endeuoring the good of all Christendome. By Hugh Broughton.
author: Broughton, Hugh, 1549-1612.
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
